TopicTitle: A Glorious Day at the Office

Articles.Content:
So, I spent an hour or so with Bill on a science collection mission and brought him home after a few polar orbits. He was astounded by the beauty of his office and just had to snap a few shots for his keeps back at base.

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Did you change the height of the layer for the lights ? On my version they are a lot lower. I never get re-entry effects when i am at its level.
